properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_CODE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_VIEW FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_CODE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_VIEW = NOTICE_VIEW+1 WHERE NOTICE_CODE = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_CODE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_VIEW FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_CODE = ?
INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_CODE , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO "FILE" ( F_CODE , F_NAME , F_RENAME , F_PATH , F_EXTENSION , F_REF , F_REFCODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SUBSTR(?,INSTR(?,'.', -1)+1) , 'N' , SEQ_NOTICE.CURRVAL )
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' WHERE NOTICE_CODE = ?
